modName: Elder Scrolls Audio Lore Books in epub and mobi
summary: All known Elder Scrolls Lore Books Converted from text to speech
descriptionHtml:
[size=3]update 1: added only the text files of the lore books i made from uesp site. main file has both mp3's and the text files. incase someone just wants the text files only for their own software.

update 2:Converted my text files i created from uespwiki lore books to .mobi format for easier ebook usage.

update 3:[/size]Converted my text files i created from uespwiki lore books to .epub format for easier ebook usage.[size=3]

This file contains all known Elder Scroll Lore Books Converted from Text to Speech. As of July 24th 2016 in English.

Reasoning behind making these files, i am someone whom is becoming more visually impaired and the lore books are sometimes difficult to read, with the fonts they use across games. And to introduce a way to listen to the lore books with greater ease in a one stop shop.

This mod can be used as a standalone and just listen to all the lore books in file format .mp3 44.1khz 16bit with text file.

Or could be used as a modders resource for a possible talking library.

The files are freely usable by anyone for personal use or for making a mod for free. But the files are NOT available for use for profit or apps or software that are for sale or run ads.

[url=https://www.youtube.com/embed/nERoPHQaQwU]"https://www.youtube.com/embed/nERoPHQaQwU"[/url]

Books were taken from one of the best official or unofficial if one would say canon sites UESPWIKI.
[url=http://en.uesp.net/wiki/Lore:Library]http://en.uesp.net/wiki/Lore:Library[/url]

Software used to translate the text to speech is Balabolka
[url=http://www.cross-plus-a.com/balabolka.htm]http://www.cross-plus-a.com/balabolka.htm

used hamstersoft to convert the text files to mobi 
http://www.hamstersoft.com/free-ebook-converter/[/url]

I used Voice Microsoft zira, 16bit 44.1khz at 256bit rate set at rate 2 speed 1 level 100. and a great many open source libraries and my own homograph files.[/size]
author: Jalore
